featured.text: Completely wheelchair-accessible, the park features 25 acres of attractions including rides, playgrounds, a catch-and-release fishing lake, and picnic areas throughout the park.
It is where the glacier runs to the lake.
In the cross-lake swimming race, a boat will be _____ in case of an emergency.
According to this passage, the cook of the Moon Lake Restaurant _______.

other.text: Whenever I set foot on the soil of Rwanda, a country in east-central Africa, I feel as if I have entered paradise: green hills, red earth, sparkling rivers and mountain lakes.
Beside the lake, beneath the trees, Fluttering and dancing in the breeze.
The Moon Lake Restaurant’s menu included French-fried potatoes, a popular food recipe brought back from France by Thomas Jefferson.

definition.zh_def: 湖泊：一種大型的淡水或鹹水體，通常被陸地包圍。
definition.en_def: A large body of water surrounded by land, typically freshwater or saltwater.
definition.example: The children played by the lake on a sunny afternoon.
